attributes.action: reverse the decision not to free the Great Train Robber Ronnie Briggs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ronnie Biigs is a very ill man.  He is highly unlikely, in his current state of health, to carry out any further crimes.  Murderers, rapists and paedophiles are being let out to strike at innocent members of the public again. In this time of recession and a time when we hear of prinsons being overcrowded, please show compassion to Mr Biggs and his family by allowing him home to die a free man with dignity

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions, we cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
